title: DC reaches $750K settlement in Trump inaugural lawsuit - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. DC reaches $750K settlement in Trump inaugural lawsuit  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. $750,000 settlement reached with DC attorney general in case involving funds used in 2017 Trump inauguration  CNN
  3. Trump Settles Suit Over Payments to Hotel for 2017 Inauguration  The New York Times
  4. Trump organizations agree to pay $750000 to settle lawsuit with D.C.  The Washington Post
  5. Washington, DC reaches $750K settlement in Trump inaugural lawsuit  syracuse.com
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Former President Donald Trump’s businesses and inaugural committee have reached a deal to pay Washington, D.C., $750,000 to resolve a lawsuit   that alleged the committee overpaid for events at his hotel and enriched the former president’s family in the process, according to the District of Columbia’s attorney general.
